title: PM Modi is NOT declaring Emergency under Article 360; don’t believe the FAKE news | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Amid the Coronavirus outbreak, a news article is making rounds on social media according to which Prime Minister Narendra Modi is likely to declare Emergency in India under Article 360 (Financial Emergency).

Click here to read the article

The headline read: “Narendra Modi Likely To Declare A Emergency In India Under Article 360”

ALSO READ: The government is not declaring ‘National Emergency’; don’t believe this WhatsApp…

NewsMobile fact-checked the above claim and found it to be FAKE.

The Press Information Bureau clarified that the news in circulation is FAKE and the government has ‘no such plans’.

Hence, the above information proves that the viral claim is FAKE.
